# OPTA API
The OPTA API enables you interact with the [StatsPerform/OPTA API documentation](https://documentation.statsperform.com/docs/data/index.html) or transform .json data from the API.

### Installation
The source code is currently hosted on GitHub at: https://github.com/FC-Nordsjaelland/opta-api

Installers for the latests released version are available at [Python package index](https://pypi.org/project/opta-api/)
```
pip install opta-api
```
Or you can install the development version through GitHub
```
pip install git+https://github.com/FC-Nordsjaelland/opta-api.git#egg=opta-api
```
